issues.description: The solution defines `numberOfInscribedStudents` as a `long`, but the UML diagram in the problem statement specifies it as an `int`. This mismatch will confuse students and prevent them from matching the expected attribute type when implementing and testing.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of `numberOfInscribedStudents` in the solution from `long` to `int` to match the UML diagram.
